bwwExcerpt: Crudup, who originated the role of the tutor on Broadway in 1995, delivers a quite brilliant portrayal of the weasellike university don desperate to find a Lord Byron connection and burnish his credentials. Esparza, as a graduate student of mathematics who focuses on grouse population, has taken a quieter role and made it heartbreaking.
